title: More OP than Kha'zix
body:
Ol' mate Jarvo Four-n-Twenty - that's a brilliant skin idea, actually.

The damage with Electrocute is just insane. I think I've found my get-out-of-Plat card.

replies.body:
Jarvo Four-n-Twenty - Incredible, thats so Aussie, should be specific skin to OCE XD

Riot get your ass into gear and make this a thing

ty
When he ults he yells, "Rabbit food!"

I actually like Aftershock J4 Support
Works mad with Varus, especially with the lv2 engage

Good luck to you mate. 
If you find something you're strong with, and enjoy, climbing becomes a whole lot better.
